com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation

Class AnimateDismissAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.BaseAdapterDecorator
        • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.itemmanipulation.AnimateDismissAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SectionIndexer, SpinnerAdapter, ListViewSetter, DynamicListView.Swappable

    public class AnimateDismissAdapter
extends BaseAdapterDecorator
    A BaseAdapterDecorator class that provides animations to the removal of items in the given BaseAdapter.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
